progetto.view.gui

Class SagradaPaneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.gui.AbstractStateController
      • progetto.view.gui.SagradaPaneController

  • public class SagradaPaneController
extends AbstractStateController
    this is the class that handles the sagrada pane fxml. This class is only instanced by javafx, this mean that must have a default constructor.
    Author:
    Federica
